survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Ride-Sharing Apps
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of ride-sharing apps to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve service quality.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use ride-sharing apps?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users by frequency of use. Consider using a frequency scale for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use ride-sharing apps?

questions.question_text: Which ride-sharing apps have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: This helps identify market share and brand awareness. Ensure 'Other' includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an open text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which ride-sharing apps have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing app? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: This identifies key decision-making factors. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes with a maximum selection limit of 3. Include an open text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing app? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your most recent ride-sharing experience? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measurable satisfaction data. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your most recent ride-sharing experience? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for ride-sharing apps?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for ride-sharing apps?
